column4: If I have a MPEG4 movie and it uses OGG and XviD - will it play when ubuntu is first installed ?!
If I have a MPEG4 movie and it uses OGG and XviD - will it play when ubuntu is first installed ?!
the ogg bit will, but the xvid may well need extra codecs to be installed
afaik the format is patent encumbered. there is a codec in multiverse, but that means it won't be installed by default
